q:
In Salesforce, which of the following business objectives are achieved by using Sales Cloud:

  1. Accumulating important sales leads
  2. Closing more deals
  3. Getting request-specific deals
  4. Implementing quicker decisions
In Salesforce, if you have created a link between the sales data and the sales goals, then which of the following features of Sales Cloud is represented in this scenario?
In Salesforce, you are working on Sales Cloud. If you are optimizing campaigns based on market response and closure interaction, then which of the following can occur?

a.option: More number of deals can be obtained
More number of deals can be closed

q: In Salesforce, if you have created and changed the quotes in response to a sales interaction, then which of the following features of Sales Cloud is represented in this scenario?
What does the Salesforce sharing model determine?

a.option: What is the level of access to records?
Why do they have access to records?

q: Which of the following is not included in Visualforce pages?
Dynamic Dashboard should have a managed refresh.
In Salesforce, which of the following have the same ID?

a.option: Production, Development sandbox and Full copy sandbox
Production, Unit Testing, and Full copy sandbox

q: In SalesForce, the Related-List displays the multiple sides of the one-to-many relationship.
In SalesForce, when data is deleted, for how many days is it retained in the recycle bin?
In SalesForce, which of the following modules can not be executed on the lead conversion from a lead object?
In Salesforce, data is lost if the data type is converted from any other type to a number.
In SalesForce, which of the following statements is true?

a.option: User record can be deleted permanently
User record cannot be deleted permanently
Deleting of a record depends on Profile Settings of the Administrator
User Records can be archived so that they are available on request

q: In SalesForce, which of the following features is not included in custom objects?
In SalesForce, which of the following processes is displayed in the process visualizer?
In SalesForce, which of the following features is available in the custom report?
In SalesForce, the running users of the dynamic dashboards can be set as logged-in users.
In SalesForce, which of the following is used to give access to the master record to create, edit, or delete records?
In SalesForce, which of the following editions is used to create managed packages?
Which of the following field types is not mandatory in SalesForce?
Which of the following date fields is used with the forecast date in SalesForce?
What is the significance of a junction object in SalesForce?

a.option: It is a standard object with two master-detail relationships.
It is a custom object with two master-detail relationships.
It is a standard object with three master-detail relationships.
It is a custom object with one master-detail relationship.

q:
A company wants to use the import tool to import different types of data. Which type of data should be excluded?

In Salesforce, which type of data should be excluded when a company wants to the import tool to import different types of data?
In Salesforce, the case assignment rules are based on the elapsed time.
In Salesforce, what is the size of the limit of attachment?
In Salesforce, the standard reports parameters can be changed and saved in the same standard report.
In Salesforce, which of the following settings can be specified in a profile?

a.option: Enable read, create, edit, and delete on objects

q: In Salesforce, how many objects can be imported or updated using the data loader at a time?
In Salesforce, which of the following options does not support inline editing?
In Salesforce, which of the following is required to create a trending report on historical data?

You have to create a custom object for the following information about a company:

  • All the positions below $50,000 must be approved by the hiring manager
  • All the positions above $50,000 must be approved by both the hiring manager and the regional hiring manager

In Salesforce, which of the following will you use to achieve this?

a.option: Use Apex Code to check the salary of a position and assign to the appropriate resource for approval

q:
You need to ensure that:

  • All the users are able to see all the fields
  • Mark Jones should be able to see all the fields except the Mobile field

Which of the following will you use to achieve this?

A company has 2 custom objects to track job positions and salary for the positions. Everyone on the organization should be able to see the positions and only select users can view the salary records.

Which of the following steps should be taken to complete the task?

a.option: Create a lookup relationship between positions and salaries; define public access on position and private access on salary.
Create a master-detail relationship between positions and salaries; define public access on position and private access on salary.
Create a master-detail relationship between positions and salaries; define private access on position and private access on position and create sharing rules on salary.
Create a master-detail relationship between positions and salaries; define public access on position and public access on salary.

q: Which of the following must be present in the comma separated value file before upload?

a.option: Profile of the user who owns record
Force.com ID for the record to be updates
List views in which the dates should be stor

q: In Salesforce, for which OWD sharing defaults, sharing-setting rules cannot be defined?

a.option: Sharing rules can be created for any of these options

q: In Salesforce, which of the following is not a roll-up summary field operation?
In Salesforce, who among the following decides the KPI’s for the Service and Support Metrics?
In Salesforce, which of the following relations retrieves back the details and the sub details if the deletion of the parent record is undone?
In Salesforce, standard reports are used as a source report for an analytical snapshot.
In Salesforce, which of the following functions is used to assure if the Social Security Number follows a specific order?
In Salesforce, which of the following is deactivated before migrating the data into the production?
In Salesforce, which of the following features is used to create a report on historical data?
In Salesforce, which of the following folders is used for storage?

a.option: Reports, dashboards, documents and email templates

q: In Salesforce, which of the following occurs when the primary relationship is removed from Junction Object?

a.option: Secondary relationship is made primary manually

q: In Salesforce, which of the following represents a timeframe for the dated exchange rate?
In Salesforce, which of the following is used to calculate ROI of a campaign?

a.option: (Actual Cost - Total Value Won Opps) divided by the Total Value Won Opps
(Total Value Won Opps - Actual Cost) divided by the Total Value Won Opps
(Actual Cost - Total Value Won Opps) divided by the Actual Cost
(Total Value Won Opps - Actual Cost) divided by the Actual Cost

q: In Salesforce, which of the following information is not present in debug logs?
In Salesforce, which of the following about the custom summary formula field is not correct?

a.option: Summary formula can reference another summary formula
When fields are deleted, they are also deleted from the summary formulae
One can have 5 custom summary formulae on a report
The summary types sum, largest value, smallest value, and average cannot be used with the record count field

q: Which of the following features in Salesforce brings a list view and a related record together into one screen with different frames?
In Salesforce, which of the following occurs when a user owns an opportunity record but does not have the Read permission on the opportunity object?

a.option: He still sees the opportunity record
He is not able to see the opportunity Record
He is not able to write the opportunity Record

q: Which of the following is not supported by the Salesforce softphone?
In Salesforce, which of the following dashboard components is used to represent two values?
In Salesforce, which of the following about a profile is not correct?

a.option: Give access to records by modifying the record types

q: In Salesforce, the Pagelayout Editor is used to make a field_____.
In Salesforce, how many master-detail relationships is present on the object side?
In Salesforce, which of the following occurs if the parent record is deleted in the parent-child relationship with a lookup connection between parent and child objects?
In Salesforce, what is the difference between sales process and opportunity record?

a.option: Sales Process handles all the Picklist Fields
Record Type handles all the Picklist Fields
Record Type handles the stage field and Sales Process handles all other Picklist Fields
Sales Process handles the stage field and Record Type handles all other Picklist Fields

q: Which of the following features is not supported Salesforce?
In Salesforce, which of the following fields cannot be used as an external Id?
In Salesforce, which of the following is used to edit any record by using the sharing model?
In Salesforce, which of the following conditions is mandatory to start the approval process for a record?

a.option: Record should be submitted for approval

q: In Salesforce, which of the following represents a controller in the Model-View-Controller?
In SalesForce, which of the following Boolean functions is not used in the advanced filter criteria for reports?
Which of the following tabs can be created in SalesForce?
In Salesforce, which of the following is used to restrict a specific field for a user?
Which of the following is not available in a standard salesforce.com profile?
In Salesforce, which of the following tools can be used to import 85,500 records?

a.option: Available pick list items and page layout

q: Which of the following cannot be controlled by a user's profile in Salesforce?

a.option: Fields that the user may edit

q: Which of the following custom components can be added to a home page in Salesforce?
Which of the following field types is designated as an external ID in Salesforce?

Which of the following is the correct answer for below statement:

A user has read access to an account,can he attach the file in the attachment on record?

a.option: Yes,If the file is less than 5 MB
Yes, if file is more than 5 MB

q: Which of the following determines the base level access in Salesforce.com?
In Salesforce, which of the following is not returned by a formula field?
Which of the following is the Standard Controller Action method used in Salesforce?
In a MVC paradigm of SalesForce, which of the following objects is not a part of the presentation layer?
In Salesforce, which of the following about a many-to-many relationship is correct?

a.option: Many-to-many relationship can be created directly
Junction object is used to create a many-to-many relationship
Code is used to relate both objects
Not Possible to create a many-to-many relationship in Salesforce.com

q: In Salesforce, which of the following records will be accessible to the user if the data access permission depends on the role?

a.option: Data which is owned by users above the role hierarchy of the user.
Data which is accessible by users above the role hierarchy of the user.
Data which is owned by users bellow the role hierarchy of the user.
Data which is accessible by users bellow the role hierarchy of the user.

q: In Salesforce, it is possible to run a Data Loader from the command line.
In SalesForce, which of the following statements about Force.com sites is incorrect?

a.option: It can leverage declarative page layouts as web pages.
It enables developers to build public unauthorized sites.
It can leverage dates in the SalesForce organization.

q: In SalesForce, the debug logs are used to track ________________.

In Salesforce, which of the following is closely related to the view layer of the Model-View-Controller?
Which of the following Salesforce editions is currently unavailable?
In Salesforce, which of the following is a prerequisite for creating an app using a declarative model?

a.option: Configure an application using 'clicks not code'

q:
A company wants to view the value of Opportunity Stage field on an Opportunity product related list.

Please choose the declarative method of fulfilling the requirement.

a.option: Create an Apex method to replicate the value on the child object, and set the field level security to read-only and expose the new field on the Opportunity product related list.
Create an object formula field on the opportunity product Object and expose the formula field on the opportunity product related list.
Create a validation rule on the opportunity product object.
Create a new picklist field called stage on the opportunity Product object, and expose the field on the opportunity.

q: In the Salesforce role hierarchy, the permission of the report also apply to the higher roles.
In Salesforce, a dashboard visitor is allowed to view the data based on security settings of the current user despite their own personal security settings.
In Salesforce, how many fields are allowed in the unlimited edition?
In Salesforce, which of the following objects has the feature of business hours?
In Salesforce, what percentage of code is tested before it is made live?
In Salesforce, the roll-up summary and formula fields are readable on the main page and not available on the edit page.
In Salesforce, the multi-currency feature is enabled _______________.

a.option: From the sidebar component of setup
By raising a case with salesforce.com

q: In Salesforce, if the login hours for a user's profile is set from 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM, then what is a user's state at 5:31 PM?

a.option: User keeps working continuously without any issues
User is asked in a Popup window if he would like to extend his session
User is logged out when he tries to do any DML (Data Manipulation) Operation i.e. Save, Edit etc.

q: In Salesforce, which of the following access permissions should be the organization-wide default (OWD) to make an account owner visible to the case that is created by a Support Representative?
In Salesforce, which of the following record ids is identical?

a.option: Record Ids are always different in different environment

q: In SalesForce, which of the following is used to best track the changes made to data?
What should an organisation do to have universal edit records except for a person Z restricting his read access to the object?

a.option: Modify the sharing access for the object to public read/write And remove user z from the role hierarchy
Modify the sharing access for the object to private and remove User z from the role hierarchy
Modify the sharing access for the object to public read only, Create a public group with everyone except user z; Create a sharing rule and define read/write access to the public group.
Modify the sharing access for the object to public and remove User z from the role hierarchy

q: When is the Roll-Up Summary field calculated in Salesforce?

a.option: When the record is created or updated
When the related object record is created or updated

q: Which of the following methods is not a part of the Visualforce controller?
Which of the following denotes the possibility of restricting opportunity creation on lead creation?
A company is willing to leverage a data loader to load data into SF. Which of these cannot be done by a data loader?

a.option: Import data into 2 objects in a single transaction

q: In Salesforce, which of the following tools can be utilized to create a data model?
In SalesForce, which of the following Dashboard Components is used to display the details of the top 20 open opportunities with respect to the amount?
Which of the following is the use of the primary master-detail relation in SalesForce?

a.option: Look and Feel is inherited from Primary Master Object
Record Ownership is inherited from Primary Master Object
Both, Look and Feel is inherited from Primary Master Object and Record Ownership is inherited from Primary Master Object

q: What is the significance of combination charts in SalesForce?

a.option: It can add a line to an existing line, a vertical column, a grouped vertical column or a stacked vertical column chart.
It can add a cumulative line to an existing line cumulative chart.
It can add utmost three columns to a vertical column chart.

q: In SalesForce, which of the following is used to display the number of positions in each department?

Which of the following steps are part of the process to enable Multi-Currency in an org?

In Salesforce, which of the following is a step in the process of enabling multi-currency in an organisation?

a.option: Contacting salesforce.com to enable multiple currencies

In Salesforce, which of the following statements about Sales Cloud are correct:

  1. It enhances the effectiveness of the sales team of an organization and hence increases the number of sales deals.
  2. It is used to provide the information that is gathered from the social platforms about the product and customer.
  3. It is used to judge the potential of a sales lead in an organization.
In Salesforce, which of the following will be changed if the language of help is changed?

a.option: It can only be included in one application.
It can be included in as many applications as required.
It can only be included in standard applications.
It can only be included in custom applications.

q: In SalesForce, the modifications in the application process is recognised ____________.

a.option: By setting up an audit trail
From the “Modified by“ tab under approval definitions

q:

What type of relationship should be used?

Scenario: An organization wants to leverage the custom objects to track bugs and wants the ability to relate bugs to parent bugs in a parent-child relationship.

a.option: Tags can be enabled by enabling the 'Tags' permission for an organization.
Tags can be enabled by enabling the 'Tags' permission for specific profiles.
Tags can be added to the records.
Tags can be accessed from the sidebar component.

q: Which of the following statements is considered while uploading data on Salesforce by using a data loader?

a.option: Universally required field settings are respected
Required fields on page layouts are enforced

q:
Select from the below given options based upon the given conditions:

A criteria-based sharing rule that specifies "Company" in a text field won't share records with "company" in the field.

a.option: First record gets updated and error is thrown for second record
First record gets updated and second record gets created

q: In Salesforce, which of the following is not available in the formula field?

Dashboard components cannot be retrieved from the recycle bin after deletion

Retrieving of the deleted components depends on the version

Within the model logic of the MVC architecture

q: Which of the following must be implemented to track revenue gain or loss based on current fluctuations?

a.option: The default Locale of the user is also set to the new Organization Level locale
The User is asked for a Choice; if he would like to choose New Organization Locale or his own Locale
No Impact on the User as he keeps using his own default Locale
From a new session, user will see everything in the New Organization Locale

a.option: Both page layout and settings panel

q: In Salesforce, which of the following is important for the first Master-detail relationship?

a.option: Detail and Edit pages use color and any associated icon of the primary master object.
You cannot delete the primary relationship.
You cannot rename the primary relationship.

q: In Salesforce, which of the following is not used in a user page layout?

a.option: No concept of primary object in custom report type

Only when a record is created
Every time a record is created or edited

It cannot be created within the console

q: In Salesforce, encrypted fields can be edited when View Encrypted Data (VED) is set to true.

Which of the following object we cannot send with the help of Salesforce inbuilt import tooI?
In Salesforce, when do we calculate Cross-Object formula?

a.option: When an update is scheduled and when it is viewed

q:
Choose the correct option from below:

An organization has created an application to manage new hires and job positions. A custom object has been created to manage all the job positions. Using an approval process, they configure the application to have the first step of the process to require approvals from three different hiring managers.

a.option: Approve or reject based on the first response
Require majority approval from all selected approvers
Require x out of y approval from all selected approvers
Require y out of x approval from all selected approvers

q: In Salesforce, which of the following is not required if you want users to access the tags?

a.option: Add tags to the sidebar of the home page layout

q: In Salesforce, which of the following methods is used to add a custom object to a quick create list?

a.option: Add an object through the home page component settings.
Expose a custom tab for the custom object.
Enable a quick create on the user profile.

q: Which of the following paths is followed to enter data in SalesForce?

a.option: On an child object’s mini-page layout
On an parent object’s mini-page layout related lists field selection
On the parent object’s page layout related lists field selection

q: In Salesforce, which of the following data types is not supported by formula field?

Parent can refer the child only.
